item.title: 30 second video for SaaS brand - Upwork
item.description:
We are a marketing agency that specializes in affiliate marketing. We are coming out with a client portal that allows brands to check in on what's happening in their program and need a short commercial/video to introduce clients to the new platform. Logins will be provided to grab/create graphics. The video should use animation to tell the story.

This is the script for the video. Applicants who have experience with voiceovers is a plus but not necessary.

"Elevate your affiliate marketing with Bloom, Advertise Purple's innovative client intelligence dashboard.
Gain real-time insights into affiliate recruitment and optimization, empowering your brand with the data it needs to thrive. Bloom goes beyond mere analysis, interpreting trends, optimizing partnerships, and enabling your team to quickly capitalize on market opportunities. For the modern marketer, Bloom is essential for making data-driven decisions that drive growth and ensure a competitive advantage.
Step into the future of affiliate program management with Bloom by Advertise Purple—transform your strategy with unparalleled clarity and actionable intelligence today."

Here are some videos for inspiration/guidelines for the visual elements of the video.
https://youtu.be/zBHPxbBuTSg?si=PtPZGjZoZHIxqynW
https://youtu.be/PiPSUPQMhpI?si=Zy_SPTo4B_r43T74
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bf2tFixliMA

Please provide examples of past work in your proposal!



Posted On: June 20, 2024 17:07 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:MP4, Corporate Video, Motion Graphics, Explainer Video, Graphic Design, Video Editing, Video Commercial
Skills: MP4, Corporate Video, Motion Graphics, Explainer Video, Graphic Design, Video Editing, Video Commercial
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Podcast Streaming Setup - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled professional who can help us set up our podcast for streaming using Wordpress and Blubrry. The ideal candidate should have experience in podcast production and be familiar with popular streaming platforms. Additionally, the candidate should be able to provide guidance on best practices for podcast hosting and distribution.
  Skills required:
  - Podcast production
  - Streaming platforms
  - Podcast hosting and distribution
  - Wordpress
  - Blubrry
  
  This is a small-sized project that can be completed within 1 to 3 months. We are seeking an intermediate-level expert who can deliver high-quality results.

Hourly Range: $20.00-$40.00
Posted On: June 20, 2024 17:05 UTC
Category: Audio Editing
Skills:Podcast, Podcast Production, Video Stream, WordPress, Web Development
Skills: Podcast, Podcast Production, Video Stream, WordPress, Web Development
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Short form content video editor (FRENCH) - Upwork
item.description:
Nous recherchons un monteur vidéo talentueux et créatif pour rejoindre notre équipe pour une collaboration à long terme. Le candidat idéal sera responsable du montage de contenus vidéo courts en français, en assurant des éléments visuels et audio de haute qualité.

Responsabilités :
- Monter des vidéos courtes avec des transitions dynamiques, des sous-titres et des animations pour améliorer l'attrait visuel.
- Ajouter des effets sonores pour créer une expérience audio captivante.
- Livrer les vidéos complétées dans les 24 heures suivant la mission.
- Collaborer avec notre équipe pour comprendre la vision et les exigences de chaque vidéo.

Exigences :
- Expérience avérée en montage vidéo, en particulier avec des contenus courts.
- Maîtrise de logiciels de montage tels qu'Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro ou similaires.
- Solide compréhension de la narration visuelle et des techniques de montage dynamiques.
- Capacité à ajouter des sous-titres et à créer des animations attrayantes.
- Expérience en montage sonore et ajout d'effets sonores.
- Parler couramment le français.
- Capacité à respecter des délais serrés et à livrer un travail de haute qualité à temps.

Charge de travail :
- 1 à 2 vidéos par semaine, avec un potentiel d'augmentation de la charge de travail à l'avenir.
- Collaboration à long terme si les résultats répondent à nos attentes.

Si vous êtes passionné par le montage vidéo et capable de livrer des vidéos créatives et de haute qualité, nous serions ravis de recevoir votre candidature. Veuillez fournir des exemples de vos travaux précédents avec votre candidature.

Budget: $10
Posted On: June 20, 2024 16:51 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:CapCut, Video Editing, French, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: CapCut, Video Editing, French, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: Video editor needed to edit virtual video interviews (Zoom recordings) - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for someone to edit virtual video interviews. Typically they're around 30-40 mins and recorded over Zoom. We'll supply a separate webcam recording of one or both hosts for higher quality and so cleaner cuts can be made between speakers compared to Zoom. The edits require syncing multiple audio/video tracks, basic cuts between speakers, pauses trimmed out, audio leveled and some limited imagery or b-roll added. Here's an example: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_blvUqeboTo

Budget: $150
Posted On: June 20, 2024 16:48 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Footage-Based Video, YouTube Video, Video Cleanup, Dialogue Editing, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Audio Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Footage-Based Video, YouTube Video, Video Cleanup, Dialogue Editing, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Audio Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Product Awareness Video / Social Media Video Post in Graphic Desing - Upwork
item.description:
If you're a graphic designer who has dabbled into the intricacies of social media and has a small-large following this quick and easy gig is for you.

The gig consists of the following.

A 1 to 3-minute (whatever time you find it necessary) video explaining a new product that's great for Graphic Designers and Small Business owners. You don't have to do a sales pitch, or sell anything. This video will only work as a way to raise awareness of the product.

You also don't have to post on your social media, though we can work something out if you think the product is a good fit.

The product will be sent to you at no cost.

Please send me similar work you've done once applying.

Budget: $300
Posted On: June 20, 2024 16:38 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Comparison Infographic, Geographic Infographic, Informational Infographic, Video Editing, Video Commercial, Graphic Design, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Comparison Infographic, Geographic Infographic, Informational Infographic, Video Editing, Video Commercial, Graphic Design, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Need a video editor to help produce visually captivating social clips from long-form videos. - Upwork
item.description:
I'm looking for a seasoned video editor that can take long-form video and turn them into visually captivating short clips best suited for LinkedIn, Twitter, and YouTube.

This is an opportunity to partner with a company for long-term projects.

I've attached a long-form video and a short clip example I'm looking to have recreated for my company's services.

For this exercise, take the long-form video and turn it into a short clip similar to the one attached.

Budget: $20

item.title: TikTok Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled TikTok video editor who can create engaging and viral videos for our brand. The ideal candidate should have a good understanding of TikTok trends and be able to craft content that resonates with our target audience. The responsibilities include editing raw footage, adding transitions and effects, selecting suitable music, and optimizing videos for maximum engagement. The editor should have strong storytelling skills, attention to detail, and the ability to work within tight deadlines. Experience with video editing software and a portfolio of TikTok videos will be highly preferred.

Skills required:
- Proficient in video editing software
- Strong understanding of TikTok trends
- Excellent storytelling skills
- Attention to detail
- Ability to work within tight deadlines
- Portfolio of TikTok videos

Hourly Range: $10.00-$25.00
Posted On: June 20, 2024 16:24 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
